## Refried Beans  

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| ~3 cups  | 40-60 min | N/A | 


### Ingredients:

- 1 cup dry pinto beans
- &frac12; tsp salt
- 1&frac23; cups water 

### Directions 

- In the morning cover the beans with hot water, soak for 6-8 hours 
- put beans into instant pot with 1&frac23; water and salt 
- cook on high for 16-20 minutes, natural release of pressure (~20 minutes) 
- blend beans & liquid for ~45-60 seconds 

Can make without soaking beans by putting directly into instant pot for 60 minutes and ~3 cups of water
